name: Hiroshi Tanaka
description: Hiroshi is a 60-year-old professional living in Tokyo, Japan. With a friendly demeanor and a cautious approach to decision-making, he is eager to explore cognitive exercises for dementia prevention as he is acutely aware of the importance of mental health in maintaining an active lifestyle. His beginner-level tech experience does not deter him; rather, he is motivated to learn and adapt, especially in public spaces where he feels the social pressure to stay sharp and engaged.

task_profile.task: find cognitive exercises for dementia prevention

instructions.dialogue: Be brief and direct, give minimal information.
instructions.profile: Only share profile information when specifically asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express minimal emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

additional_requirements: Positive user reviews focusing on cognitive benefits

metadata.task: find cognitive exercises for dementia prevention
